text: 'ina 'arsalnak -ayha alrswl- bialdiyn alhaqu almwyd balhjj walmejzat, fbllighh lilnaas mae tbshyr almuminin bkhyry aldunya walakhrt, wtkhwyf almeandyn bima yantaziruhum min eadhab allh, walast -bed alblagh- masyuwlana ean kafar man kafar bk; fa'iinahum yadkhulun alnaar yawm alqyamt, wala yakhrujun mnha
